vsParam:
Hmm, my wings are a little off from their best...
They're not stable... I mean, they're a bit rigid?

I have no idea what you're talking about.
I think an apple will fix it?

Right. So, [px]!
Please give me a tasty apple...

Uh? Ru Sensei.
You have never been this busy.

Oh, it's you.
Sorry, I'm not available for any chit-chat now.

A tough dragon just showed up.
I'm busy confirming how much damage it caused.

A tough... dragon? Uh——!?
You mean the dragon depicted in fairy tales!?

Or what? Dragons are real monsters. They're
seldom seen, but sages are investigating their ecology.

Even though the concept of dragons sounds vague,
there are various subclasses of them...

And this dragon is with super magic power,
so much more powerful than average monsters.

Thus, affected by it, all the monsters around here
are becoming really fierce or easily frightened.

Wow... What a dreadful dragon. It will create trouble
even it's just walking around in the neighborhood...

Yeah. It's more than the affected monsters as we've
received reports of a simultaneous space-time distortion.

Space-time distortion? It happened after
the dragon's appearance, so they're related?

The only possible reason should be the dragon's
magic power. But we need more detailed investigation...

Anyway, this dragon is very threatening.
Look, do not leave the Academy.

We don't know where that dragon is yet.
You may run into it outside and I'm not kidding.
I see. So we need to collect information first!
Yup! We have to locate that dragon and kill it ASAP!

Of course we heard you. But how could we
take cover in the Academy and do nothing?!
Let's try our best to deal with it!

Oh——! It will endanger everyone in the Academy
if we leave it there!

Hey, this is your home, [px]!
Do not back down, OK?!

Look, we do this for everyone in the Academy!
Let's try our best to deal with it, [px]!

Oh my god, I can't believe you're so reckless
even under this circumstance...

I'll let you go to Ruhuna Village now.
You can come back if anything happens there.

OK, our destination is Ruhuna Village!
Let's go!
